response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence in its field. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its value surpasses $1,200,000 to us. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the immense value this product can bring to your endeavors. We are confident that once you experience its benefits, you'll understand why we consider it worth every penny. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 1100000}
